title: Charming little boutique hotel with easy walking distance to centre
text: Nice but small room - nicely appointed. Shower no bath. Air conditioning not functioning in winter made sleeping difficult. Too hot with windows closed and too noisy with windows open. Via del Tritone is a very busy road with too many mopeds and motorbikes screaming about. Noise stops in the early hours and starts again about 5am. Only spoiler. Nice breakfast buffet. Charming and helpful staff.
